reviews.text: We have been so pleased with Dean and his crew at Carpet Depot in Snellville.  We also were pleased with their installers.  We had an issue with one of the carpets and, without going into detail, Dean made sure we were satisfied.  He did not have to do this.  We highly recommend this business.

Dean is the best!  Always knowledgeable, has great product on the sales floor and can get you any kind of carpet you’d need.
Miss you bud!

Looking for a carpet remnant - they had a large selection at very reasonable prices, let you walk around & look yourself, not trying to upsell/pressure.
Staff (primary Elizabeth) was very kind & (actually) helpful - they also rolled the carpet up to fit inside my SUV.
Went about as smoothly as can be - would come back!

Amazing selection, pricing and customer service! Had the whole house carpet replaced and installed new hardwoods in the upstairs hall that was matched to the main level flooring. Dean and his crew are extremely knowledgeable and patient and will work with you through the entire process. Highly recommend!

Dean was great getting me just the flooring I wanted!!! Got everything measured and the install was great and had all the old floors removed and the new ones installed in two days!!! I got LVP and I love them!!! Dean and his crew will make sure you’re happy!!! I highly recommend!!!
